mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOVEL_HOME(n_num, n_title, n_summary, n_image_name, n_image_path, n_image_size, n_pub_date, n_report, m_num) VALUES(N_NUM_SEQ.nextval, #{n_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{n_summary, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{n_image_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{n_image_path, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{n_image_size, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, sysdate, #{n_report,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{m_num})
mapper.select: SELECT n_num FROM NOVEL_HOME WHERE m_num=#{m_num} AND ROWNUM=1 ORDER BY n_num DESC
SELECT c_category_id FROM NOVEL_CATEGORY WHERE n_num=#{n_num}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOVEL_POST WHERE N_NUM=#{n_num, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM NOVEL_POST ORDER BY n_num DESC) a) b WHERE b.rnum >=#{startRow} AND b.rnum <=#{endRow} AND n_num=#{n_num}
SELECT count(*) FROM novel_home WHERE m_num=#{m_num}
SELECT m_nickname FROM MEMBER WHERE m_num=(SELECT m_num FROM NOVEL_HOME WHERE n_num=#{n_num})
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM NOVEL_HOME ORDER BY n_pub_date DESC) a) b ,MEMBER m WHERE b.rnum >=#{startRow} AND b.rnum <=#{endRow} AND b.m_num = m.m_num

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, a.* FROM ( SELECT nh.* FROM NOVEL_HOME nh ,(SELECT N_NUM, sum(N_POST_VIEWCOUNT) AS viewcount FROM NOVEL_POST np GROUP BY N_NUM ORDER BY viewcount DESC)b WHERE nh.N_NUM = b.n_num(+) )a) b ,MEMBER m WHERE b.rnum >=#{startRow} AND b.rnum <=#{endRow} AND b.m_num = m.m_num
SELECT count(*) FROM novel_home WHERE UPPER(n_title) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%')

SELECT a.*, m_nickname FROM (SELECT novel_home.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM novel_home WHERE UPPER(n_title) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') ORDER BY n_num DESC) a, member WHERE (rnum>=#{startRow} AND rnum<=#{endRow}) AND member.m_num=a.m_num ORDER BY rnum asc
SELECT count(*) FROM novel_home WHERE m_num IN(SELECT m_num FROM member WHERE UPPER(m_nickname) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%'))

SELECT b.*, m_nickname FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT novel_home.* FROM novel_home WHERE m_num IN(SELECT m_num FROM member WHERE UPPER(m_nickname) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%')) ORDER BY n_num DESC) a) b, member WHERE (rnum>=#{startRow} AND rnum<=#{endRow}) AND member.m_num=b.m_num ORDER BY rnum ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM category ca, novel_category nc WHERE ca.c_category_id = nc.c_category_id AND ca.c_category_name = #{category}

SELECT a.* , m_nickname FROM(SELECT novel_home.* , ROWNUM rnum FROM novel_home WHERE n_num IN(SELECT n_num FROM category ca, novel_category nc WHERE ca.c_category_id = nc.c_category_id AND ca.c_category_name = #{category}) ORDER BY novel_home.n_num DESC) a, member WHERE rnum>=#{startRow} AND rnum<=#{endRow} AND a.m_num = member.m_num
